channel.title: Google site on tanaike
channel.description: Recent content in Google site on tanaike

item.title: Embed content as a full page in new Google Sites
item.description: By updating on May 25, 2022, the content got to be able to be embedded as a full page in the new Google site. Ref. This is very good news for me. For example, with this update, the Web Apps created by Google Apps Script can be published by embedding to the Google site as a full page. By this, the URL of the Google site, and Google Analytics can be used.
